content:
cfallin opened PR #7262 from cfallin:pcc-no-default-facts to bytecodealliance:main:

This removes the need for the awkward "max-range fact is subsumed by anything" rule noted by @fitzgen in this comment. It also makes checking a little more efficient and logically clear, as only the facts that the frontend/producer added are verified, rather than all default facts as well.

  • Explain why this change is needed. If the details are in an issue already,
    this can be brief.
